content: this is an adaption of girlingrey s deathflake pattern 1 i first saw ericag s 2 selbudeath socks 3 and wanted to adapt the pattern into selbu-style mittens april 26 2013 norwegian pattern also available norsk mønster er no tilgjengeleg 1 http //www ravelry com/patterns/library/deathflake-chart 2 http //www ravelry com/people/ericag 3 http //www ravelry com/patterns/library/selbudeath
